title: BRIEF-Zenabis Enters Into Agreement With Pax Labs To Become A Pax Era Brand Partner
text:
BRIEF-Zenabis Enters Into Agreement With Pax Labs To Become A Pax Era Brand Partner

Stock Markets 51 minutes ago (Sep 30, 2019 06:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Zenabis Enters Into Agreement With Pax Labs To Become A Pax Era Brand Partner Sept 30 (Reuters) - Zenabis Global Inc : * ZENABIS ENTERS INTO AGREEMENT WITH PAX LABS TO BECOME A PAX ERA BRAND PARTNER * ZENABIS GLOBAL INC - UNDER WHICH ZENABIS WILL SUPPLY CANNABIS EXTRACTS FOR PAX ERA PODS DESIGNED FOR USE WITH PAX ERA VAPORIZER DEVICE
